pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering Data with Non-Ignorable Missingness using Semi- Parametric Mixture Models // Clustering of data under a non- ignorable missingness mechanism. Clustering is achieved by a semi-parametric mixture model and missingness is managed by using the pattern-mixture approach. More details of the approach are available in Du Roy de Chaumaray et al. (2020) arXiv:2009.07662.
